panels.description: Whether the cell has failed to pass its healthcheck against the garden backend.
panels.title: Unhealthy Cells

panels.description: Whether the cf-app domain is up-to-date, so that CF apps from CC have been synchronized with DesiredLRPs for Diego to run.
panels.title: CF Apps Synchronized

panels.description: Whether the cf-tasks domain is up-to-date, so that CF tasks from CC have been synchronized with tasks for Diego to run.
panels.title: CF Tasks Synchronized

panels.description: Available MiB of memory to allocate to containers.
panels.title: Available Memory

panels.description: Available MiB of disk to allocate to containers.
panels.title: Available Disk

panels.description: Max number of requests per second received by the BBS.
panels.title: BBS Requests per Second (max)

panels.description: Max time in nanoseconds that the BBS took to handle requests to its API endpoints.
panels.title: BBS Request Latency (max)

panels.description: Max time in nanoseconds that the BBS took to run its LRP and Task convergence pass. Emitted when LRP and Task convergence runs.
panels.title: BBS Convergence Duration (max)

panels.description: Max number of requests per second received by the Gorouter.
panels.title: Router Requests per Second (max)

panels.description: Max time in nanoseconds that the Gorouter took to handle requests to its application endpoints.
panels.title: Router Latency (max)

panels.description: Max number of Gorouter's HTTP Bad Gateway responses per second.
panels.title: Router Bad Gateway Responses per Second (max)

panels.description: Max number of requests per second received by the Cloud Controller.
panels.title: CC Requests Completed per Second (max)

panels.description: Max number of GoRouter's HTTP 5xx responses per second.
panels.title: Router 5xx Responses per Second (max)
